abstract: Pope Franccis, during last Mass of his trip to Poland, urges young people to stand up to violence, hatred and terror and to reject complacency.
lead_paragraph: The pope on Sunday expressed concern that young people “confuse happiness with a sofa” as they become indifferent to the increasingly dark events of the world.
snippet: The pope on Sunday expressed concern that young people “confuse happiness with a sofa” as they become indifferent to the increasingly dark events of the world....

headline.main: Pope Francis Urges Youths to Leave a Mark on the World, Not the Couch
headline.print_headline: Pope Tells Youth to Cast Off Complacency
